title: The complete works of Robert Burns.
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: These verses, beginning "Gude-e'en, my auld acquaintance cronie," were dug up from oblivion recently by a correspondent in a Canadian paper, and not a little noise was created about the pomme du terre, till some one skilled in old books showed that a collection of " Poems on various subjects, by Alexander Clerk, in Caulside, parish of Gleiicairn," published in Dumfiies in 1S01, contains the newly-discovered poem.
